column4: yes, so really there is a bunch of crap I don't need but as I said it was the only legit version of windows I had that I could dual boot under VMWare
-> perhaps you can disable several server services on windows 2003 and see if it will pick up
Hmmmmm I dunno I guess it could also be VMWare, cause it seems like CPU Usage is either 0% or 100% and dead slow.
-> possibly yeah.. its trial and error kind of thing to tune it to your liking
